00022 void Average::notify_average_observers()
00023 {
00024   std::vector<ObserverWeakRef>::iterator i = m_observers.begin();
00025   for (i = m_observers.begin(); i != m_observers.end(); ++i)
00026     i->lock()->observe_average_change();
00027 }

00046 KernelAverager::KernelAverager(double breadth,
00047                                double minweight,
00048                                double minfraction,
00049                                const StateVariables &scale):
00050   m_bb(breadth * breadth),
00051   m_minfraction(minfraction),
00052   m_maxd(std::sqrt(-m_bb * std::log(minweight))),
00053   m_scale(scale),
00054   m_querytree(DistanceFunction(scale)),
00055   m_basistree(DistanceFunction(scale))
00056 {}

00066 AverageRef KernelAverager::approximate(const StateVectorRef &s)
00067 {
00068   StateVectorRef query = m_querytree.insert(s);
00069   QueryContainer::value_type val(query, KernelAverageWeakRef());
00070   std::pair<QueryContainer::iterator, bool> result = m_queries.insert(val);
00071   KernelAverageWeakRef &average = result.first->second;
00072   if (average.expired())
00073     return KernelAverage::create(m_this.lock(), query, average);
00074   else
00075     return average.lock();
00076 }
00077 
00078 StateVectorRef KernelAverager::add_basis(const StateVectorRef &s)
00079 {
00080   StateVectorRef query = m_querytree.insert(s);
00081   if (query == s) { // new query (and basis)
00082     QueryContainer::value_type val(query, KernelAverageWeakRef());
00083     m_queries.insert(val);
00084   }
00085   if (m_bases.insert(query).second) { // new basis
00086     StateVectorRef basis = m_basistree.insert(query);
00087     assert(basis == query);
00088     // s is novel; update relevant queries
00089     // find possibly relevant queries
00090     std::vector<std::pair<double, StateVectorRef> > buffer;
00091     m_querytree.neighbors(std::back_inserter(buffer), basis, m_maxd);
00092 
00093     // call include method on each query
00094     std::vector<std::pair<double, StateVectorRef> >::iterator i;
00095     for (i = buffer.begin(); i != buffer.end(); ++i) {
00096       QueryContainer::iterator it = m_queries.find(i->second);
00097       assert(it != m_queries.end());
00098       KernelAverageWeakRef &ka = it->second;
00099       if (!ka.expired())
00100         ka.lock()->include(i->first, basis);
00101     }
00102   }
00103   return query;
00104 }

00107 KernelAverage::create(const KernelAveragerRef &averager,

00115 
00116 KernelAverager::KernelAverage::KernelAverage(const KernelAveragerRef &averager,
00117                                              const StateVectorRef &s):
00118   m_averager(averager), m_s(s), m_sum(0.0)
00119 {
00120   assert(m_averager);
00121   assert(m_s);
00122   m_averager->m_basistree.neighbors(std::back_inserter(m_neighbors),
00123                                     m_s,
00124                                     m_averager->m_maxd);
00125   std::sort(m_neighbors.begin(), m_neighbors.end());
00126   compute_weights();
00127 }
00128 
00129 KernelAverager::KernelAverage::~KernelAverage()
00130 {
00131   QueryContainer::iterator q = m_averager->m_queries.find(m_s);
00132   assert(q != m_averager->m_queries.end());
00133   assert(q->second.expired());
00134   if (m_averager->m_bases.find(q->first) == m_averager->m_bases.end()) {
00135     // Not a basis, safe to delete entirely
00136     m_averager->m_querytree.remove(q->first);
00137     m_averager->m_queries.erase(q);
00138   }
00139 }

00143   return m_s;

00146 const StateDistribution &KernelAverager::KernelAverage::basis_weights() const
00147 {
00148   return m_weights;

00150 
00151 void KernelAverager::KernelAverage::compute_weights()
00152 {
00153   m_weights.clear();
00154   m_sum = 0.0;
00155   NeighborContainer::iterator i = m_neighbors.begin();
00156   while (i != m_neighbors.end()) { // note also break below
00157     const double d = i->first;
00158     const StateVectorRef &x = i->second;
00159     const double w = std::exp(-d*d / m_averager->m_bb);
00160     if (m_sum == 0.0 || w/m_sum >= m_averager->m_minfraction) {
00161       vector_map_assoc(m_weights, x, w);
00162       m_sum += w;
00163       ++i;
00164     } else
00165       break;
00166   }
00167   m_neighbors.erase(i, m_neighbors.end());
00168   if (m_neighbors.capacity() > 2 * m_neighbors.size()) {
00169     // Decrease memory footprint.
00170     NeighborContainer dummy(m_neighbors); // new vector has smaller capacity()
00171     m_neighbors.swap(dummy);
00172     StateDistribution dummy2(m_weights); // new vector has smaller capacity()
00173     m_weights.swap(dummy2);
00174   }
00175 }
00176 
00177 void KernelAverager::KernelAverage::include(double d, const StateVectorRef &s)
00178 {
00179   assert(d >= 0.0);
00180   assert(s);
00181   std::pair<double, StateVectorRef> val(d,s);
00182   const double w = std::exp(-d*d / m_averager->m_bb);
00183   if (m_neighbors.empty() || val < m_neighbors.back()) {
00184     vector_set_insert(m_neighbors, val);
00185     compute_weights();
00186     notify_average_observers();
00187   } else {
00188     assert(m_sum > 0.0); // since !neighbors.empty()
00189     if (w/m_sum >= m_averager->m_minfraction) {
00190       m_neighbors.push_back(val);
00191       compute_weights();
00192       notify_average_observers();
00193     }
00194   }
00195 }

00220 AverageRef InterpolationAverager::approximate(const StateVectorRef &s)
00221 {
00222   QueryContainer::value_type val(s, InterpolationAverageWeakRef());
00223   std::pair<QueryContainer::iterator, bool> result = m_queries.insert(val);
00224   const bool was_inserted = result.second;
00225   QueryContainer::iterator &it = result.first;
00226   const StateVectorRef &state = it->first;
00227   InterpolationAverageWeakRef &average = it->second;
00228   if (average.expired()) // new query
00229     return InterpolationAverage::
00230       create(m_this.lock(), state, !was_inserted, average);
00231   else
00232     return average.lock();
00233 }

00235 InterpolationAverager::InterpolationAverageRef InterpolationAverager::InterpolationAverage::
00236 create(const InterpolationAveragerRef &averager,
00237        const StateVectorRef &s,
00238        bool is_basis,
00239        InterpolationAverageWeakRef &ref)
00240 {
00241   InterpolationAverageRef
00242     result(new InterpolationAverage(averager, s, is_basis));
00243   ref = result;
00244   return result;
00245 }
00246 
00247 InterpolationAverager::InterpolationAverage::
00248 InterpolationAverage(const InterpolationAveragerRef &averager,
00249                      const StateVectorRef &s,
00250                      bool is_basis):
00251   m_averager(averager), m_s(s), m_basis(is_basis)
00252 {
00253   assert(m_averager);
00254   assert(m_s);
00255   const StateVariables &scale = m_averager->m_scale;
00256   const size_t dim = scale.size();
00257   const double increment = std::ldexp(1.0, -m_averager->m_res);
00258 
00259   std::vector<double> floor(dim);
00260   std::vector<double> alpha(dim);
00261   unsigned i = 0;
00262   StateVariables::const_iterator it;
00263   for (it = scale.begin(); it != scale.end(); ++it) {
00264     assert(m_s->size() > it->first);
00265     const double element = (*m_s)[it->first] * it->second;
00266     const double intermediate =
00267       std::floor(std::ldexp(element, m_averager->m_res));
00268     floor[i] = std::ldexp(intermediate, -m_averager->m_res);
00269     alpha[i] = (element - floor[i]) / increment;
00270     ++i;
00271   }
00272   assert(i == dim);
00273 
00274   const unsigned numsucc = 1 << dim;
00275   for (unsigned bitvector = 0; bitvector < numsucc; ++bitvector) {
00276     boost::shared_ptr<std::vector<double> >
00277       successor(new std::vector<double>(m_s->size(), 0.0));
00278     double weight = 1.0;
00279     i = 0;
00280     for (it = scale.begin(); it != scale.end(); ++it) {
00281       const unsigned index = it->first;
00282       if (0 == (bitvector & (1 << i))) {
00283         (*successor)[index] = floor[i] / it->second;
00284         weight *= 1.0 - alpha[i];
00285       } else {
00286         (*successor)[index] = (floor[i] + increment) / it->second;
00287         weight *= alpha[i];
00288       }
00289       ++i;
00290     }
00291     assert(i == dim);
00292     if (weight > 0) {
00293       QueryContainer::value_type val(successor, InterpolationAverageWeakRef());
00294       QueryContainer::iterator it = m_averager->m_queries.insert(val).first;
00295       if (!it->second.expired()) {
00296         // Make sure that any existing Average approximating successor
00297         // knows that successor is a basis state.
00298         InterpolationAverageRef avg(it->second);
00299         avg->set_basis();
00300       }
00301       const StateVectorRef &succ = it->first;
00302       vector_map_assoc(m_weights, succ, weight);
00303     }
00304   }
00305 }
00306 
00307 InterpolationAverager::InterpolationAverage::~InterpolationAverage()
00308 {
00309   if (!m_basis) {
00310     QueryContainer::iterator it = m_averager->m_queries.find(state());
00311     assert(it != m_averager->m_queries.end());
00312     assert(it->second.expired());
00313     m_averager->m_queries.erase(it);
00314   }
00315 }

00347 AverageRef ProjectionAverager::approximate(const StateVectorRef &s)
00348 {
00349   AveragesContainer::value_type val(s, ProjectionAverageWeakRef());
00350   std::pair<AveragesContainer::iterator, bool> result = m_averages.insert(val);
00351   AveragesContainer::iterator &it = result.first;
00352   ProjectionAverageWeakRef &avg = it->second;
00353   if (avg.expired())
00354     return ProjectionAverage::create(m_this.lock(), it->first, avg);
00355   else
00356     return avg.lock();
00357 }

00359 StateVectorRef ProjectionAverager::add_basis(const StateVectorRef &s)
00360 {
00361   AveragesContainer::value_type val(s, ProjectionAverageWeakRef());
00362   return m_averages.insert(val).first->first;

00423 AverageRef DiscretizationAverager::approximate(const StateVectorRef &s)
00424 {
00425   QueryContainer::value_type val(s, DiscretizationAverageWeakRef());
00426   std::pair<QueryContainer::iterator, bool> result = m_queries.insert(val);
00427   DiscretizationAverageWeakRef &avg = result.first->second;
00428   if (avg.expired()) { // new query
00429     const StateVectorRef &state = result.first->first;
00430     bool is_basis = !result.second; // s already there but no query
00431     return DiscretizationAverage::create(m_this.lock(), state, is_basis, avg);
00432   } else
00433     return avg.lock();
00434 }

00436 DiscretizationAverager::DiscretizationAverageRef DiscretizationAverager::DiscretizationAverage::
00437 create(const DiscretizationAveragerRef &averager,
00438        const StateVectorRef &s,
00439        bool is_basis,
00440        DiscretizationAverageWeakRef &ref)
00441 {
00442   DiscretizationAverageRef
00443     result(new DiscretizationAverage(averager, s, is_basis));
00444   ref = result;
00445   return result;

00447 
00448 DiscretizationAverager::DiscretizationAverage::
00449 DiscretizationAverage(const DiscretizationAveragerRef &averager,
00450                       const StateVectorRef &s,
00451                       bool is_basis):
00452   m_averager(averager), m_s(s), m_basis(is_basis)
00453 {
00454   assert(m_averager);
00455   assert(m_s);
00456   const StateVariables &scale = m_averager->m_scale;
00457   const double increment = std::ldexp(1.0, -m_averager->m_res);
00458   
00459   boost::shared_ptr<std::vector<double> >
00460     successor(new std::vector<double>(s->size(), 0.0));
00461   StateVariables::const_iterator it;
00462   for (it = scale.begin(); it != scale.end(); ++it) {
00463     assert(m_s->size() > it->first);
00464     const unsigned index = it->first;
00465     const double element = (*s)[index] * it->second;
00466     const double intermediate =
00467       std::floor(std::ldexp(element, m_averager->m_res));
00468     const double floor = std::ldexp(intermediate, -m_averager->m_res);
00469     const double alpha = (element - floor) / increment;
00470     if (alpha > 0.5)
00471       (*successor)[index] = (floor + increment) / it->second;
00472     else
00473       (*successor)[index] = floor / it->second;
00474   }
00475   
00476   QueryContainer::value_type val(successor, DiscretizationAverageWeakRef());
00477   QueryContainer::iterator ins = m_averager->m_queries.insert(val).first;
00478   if (!ins->second.expired())
00479     ins->second.lock()->set_basis();
00480   const StateVectorRef &succ = ins->first;
00481   vector_map_assoc(m_weights, succ, 1.0);
00482 }
00483 
00484 DiscretizationAverager::DiscretizationAverage::~DiscretizationAverage()
00485 {
00486   if (!m_basis) {
00487     QueryContainer::iterator it = m_averager->m_queries.find(state());
00488     assert(it != m_averager->m_queries.end());
00489     assert(it->second.expired());
00490     m_averager->m_queries.erase(it);
00491   }
00492 }
